long_description: The fruit-based PowerBar Performance Energy Blends gel features C2MAX(R), a mixture of glucose and fructose to deliver energy to your muscles while you're working hard. C2MAX carbohydrate blend uses a 2:1 mix of glucose and fructose that fuels your muscles. Studies have shown that the C2MAX carbohydrate blend delivers up to 50% more energy to working muscles than glucose alone. Consume 1 PowerBar Performance Energy Blends gel every 20 - 45 min. during activity, followed by a few sips of water. Package can be resealed so you don't have to eat the whole thing at once. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The fruit-based PowerBar Performance Energy Blends gel features C2MAX(R), a mixture of glucose and fructose to deliver energy to your muscles while you're working hard.
